title: VA For My Friends - Close To You (Dutch Treat Spec Easy Pop)
description:
First my friends wanted to know what songs touched my heart. Now they want to know what blows my mind. Difficult question, you can hide behind your heart but hardly behind your mind. So I thought about it but could not find enough songs to make a playlist. Until I changed the question slightly into What songs changed my mind. Suddenly I had a bit more. Here a selection of the most `important` ones (we could have in common).... Enjoy,


C062 Close To You (Easy Pop)
